start.text: You are an apprentice to a renowned alchemist. He has tasked you with finding a rare ingredient for a powerful potion. You can either search for the ingredient in the enchanted forest or in the forbidden mountains.

forest.text: You find the ingredient in the enchanted forest, but you are confronted by a mystical creature. You can either try to reason with the creature or fight it.

mountains.text: You find the ingredient in the forbidden mountains, but you are caught in a blizzard. You can either seek shelter in a nearby cave or try to make your way back to the alchemist's workshop.

reason.text: You reason with the creature and it allows you to take the ingredient. You have completed your task!

fight.text: You are no match for the mystical creature. Your adventure ends here.

shelter.text: You find shelter in the cave and survive the blizzard. You have completed your task!

back.text: You get lost in the blizzard and are never seen again.
